title: That's stealing
creator_credit: Tony Schmitz, Sandra Schieck, Thom Eberhardt and FilmFair Communications
brief_description: An open ended program designed to promote discussion about the nature of friendship and trust in relation to the possible theft of a bracelet by one girl from a friend. Useful in circumstances where theft occurs in classrooms.
creator_credit_for_label: Tony Schmitz, Sandra Schieck, Thom Eberhardt and FilmFair Communications
